text: Weifang () is a prefecture-level city in central Shandong province, People's Republic of China. Its population was 9,086,241 at the 2010 census.China: Administrative Division of Shāndōng / 山东省 (Prefectures, Cities, Districts and Counties) – Population Statistics in Maps and Charts . Citypopulation.de. Retrieved on 2015-11-26. ==References== Category:Cities in China Category:Shandong
title: Weifang
